name: Vintage Levis Cream Cotton 'Jodhpur' Chinos
description:
Visit our blog for many more photos of these cream trousers in our photo shoot at www.secondhandroseworcester.co.uk

We've got our mitts on some super Levis vintage-style that are from their vintage range, based on the same designs as their original 1920s trousers. These are all 'seconds' so may have minor flaws but sometimes it doesn't appear that there's anything amiss. We love these as they are so versatile for modern and vintage outfits, in particular they work great for recreating vintage looks! 

These trousers are made from a robust, light cotton twill in cream colour and are shaped like 'jodphur'. They have some lovely features including a sewn in turn up, button fly and button down front pockets. Some of these pairs have a small stamp mark on the back seam that says 'irregular' but this doesn't detract of a great pair of versatile trousers at a bargain price!

These can be rolled up for a more modern, Summery chino-look, or worn tucked into long socks which works great for a breeches style, for vintage bicycling or Women's land army outfits.

Different, unusual sizes available from 30" waist to 34" - select the size you want from the options below.

Second Hand Rose prides itself on finding good quality items at affordable prices. We stock items from the 20s/30s to the 80s/90s, for men and women, for all occasions.  

The Second Hand Rose team are dedicated to providing the best service for all things vintage. We’ve supplied vintage clothing to BBC costume designers, freelance costumiers, styled vintage fashion shows and vintage photoshoots, as well as private clients. We’ve even put together a vintage fashion book called 'Wearable Vintage Fashion' – so you’re in good hands and can buy with confidence!  

We sell in accordance with UK Distance Selling Regulations (DSRs) but please be sure before you buy as vintage clothing is often delicate and it doesn't benefit from going back and forth in the post!  See our website for full terms and conditions plus a blog at www.secondhandroseworcester.co.uk - you can also email us with any questions us info@secondhandroseworcester.co.uk

name: Green Levis 'Vintage' Trousers
description:
Visit our blog for many more photos of these green trousers in our photoshoot at www.secondhandroseworcester.co.uk

We've got our mitts on some super Levis vintage-style that are from their vintage range, based on the same designs as their original 1920s trousers. These are all 'seconds' so may have minor flaws but sometimes it doesn't appear that there's anything amiss, it's mainly that the sizing is slightly irregular! We love these as they are so versatile for modern and vintage outfits, in particular they work great for recreating vintage looks! 

These trousers are made from a robust, light cotton twill in a military-light-moss green colour. They have some lovely features including a sewn in turn up, button fly, vintage buttons on the back pocket and buttons on the waistband for attaching large braces. 

These can be rolled up for a more modern, Summery look, or worn tucked into long socks which works great for a breeches style, for vintage bicycling or Women's land army outfits. The lenghths are all quite short as they seem to be designed for a shorter or turned up look.

We've a range of sizes from 28" to 36" waist - choose your size from the list below.

Second Hand Rose prides itself on finding good quality items at affordable prices. We stock items from the 20s/30s to the 80s/90s, for men and women, for all occasions.  

The Second Hand Rose team are dedicated to providing the best service for all things vintage. We’ve supplied vintage clothing to BBC costume designers, freelance costumiers, styled vintage fashion shows and vintage photoshoots, as well as private clients. We’ve even put together a vintage fashion book called 'Wearable Vintage Fashion' – so you’re in good hands and can buy with confidence!  

We sell in accordance with UK Distance Selling Regulations (DSRs) but please be sure before you buy as vintage clothing is often delicate and it doesn't benefit from going back and forth in the post!  See our website for full terms and conditions plus a blog at www.secondhandroseworcester.co.uk - you can also email us with any questions us info@secondhandroseworcester.co.uk

name: Unisex 'Vintage' Levis '1920s' Shorts
description:
Visit our blog for many more photos of these shorts! www.secondhandroseworcester.co.uk

We've got our mitts on some super Levis chino shorts that are from their vintage/heritage khaki range, based on the same designs as their original 1920s trousers. These are all 'seconds' so may have minor flaws but sometimes it doesn't appear that there's anything amiss, it's mainly just irregular sizing. We love these as they are so versatile for modern and vintage outfits, in particular they work great for recreating vintage looks such as land girl outfits! 

These shorts are made from a robust cotton twill in a mustard-khaki colour. They have some lovely features including button fly, vintage buttons on the back and buttons on the waistband for attaching large braces. 

These can be rolled up for a more modern look, or worn without a turn up and just below the knee which works great for a breeches style, for bicycling or Women's land army outfits, when styled with long socks etc as shown in the photos.

We have several of these pairs all with sizes 34, 36 and 38". The model in the photo is a size 28-30" waist and they don't look too overly large when worn with a belt. Pick your size from our options below.

Second Hand Rose prides itself on finding good quality items at affordable prices. We stock items from the 20s/30s to the 80s/90s, for men and women, for all occasions.  

The Second Hand Rose team are dedicated to providing the best service for all things vintage. We’ve supplied vintage clothing to BBC costume designers, freelance costumiers, styled vintage fashion shows and vintage photoshoots, as well as private clients. We’ve even put together a vintage fashion book called 'Wearable Vintage Fashion' – so you’re in good hands and can buy with confidence!  

We sell in accordance with UK Distance Selling Regulations (DSRs) but please be sure before you buy as vintage clothing is often delicate and it doesn't benefit from going back and forth in the post!  See our website for full terms and conditions plus a blog at www.secondhandroseworcester.co.uk - you can also email us with any questions us info@secondhandroseworcester.co.uk
